parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brake light can cause reduced visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, and may lead to traffic stops and fines.
symptoms: The brake light indicator appears on the dashboard
the brake light does not function
the bulb needs to be replaced frequently
the tail light assembly melts
and the socket fails to release.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the dealership to repair the rear brake light issue under the recall can lead to continued safety risks and financial burdens on the vehicle owner.
symptoms: The dealership refuses to repair the issue under the recall
citing that the vehicle is not part of the recall
despite the vehicle's make and model being included in the recall.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Braking and Electronic Stability Program (ESP) Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended braking and ESP malfunction can cause the vehicle to suddenly slow down or swerve, increasing the risk of accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle brakes suddenly and without warning
the ESP warning light illuminates on the instrument panel
the vehicle slows down abruptly
the vehicle turns to one side
the rear wheels lock
the brakes are applied involuntarily and intermittently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrochromic self-dimming mirror can cause the driver to be blinded by approaching headlights, leading to a safety hazard, or force the driver to turn the mirror away, losing rear view capability.
symptoms: The mirror fails to dim against rear approaching headlights
causing glare
the mirror leaks fluid
the mirror becomes permanently inoperable.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The power window malfunction can cause inconvenience and potentially lead to safety issues if the window becomes stuck in a partially open position.
symptoms: The power window only goes down halfway
a loose screw is causing the issue.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ESC system can cause the vehicle to suddenly brake or lose control, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The ESC warning indicator illuminates
the vehicle suddenly brakes or turns without input from the driver
the vehicle loses traction or stability
the BAS/ESP light comes on
the vehicle's tires screech or make unusual noises.
